name.baseName: Paraxylene Production ; Paraxylene ; Naphtha Route ; Naphtha
对二甲苯生产 ; 对二甲苯 ; 石脑油路线 ; 石脑油

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Aromatics Complex.The complete set of aromatics technology is currently the main process for the production of p-xylene in refining and chemical enterprises. Using naphtha as raw material, after catalytic reforming, reformingThe complete set of technology for the preparation of aromatics through the steps of whole oil separation, extraction, disproportionation, and xylene separation is currently the most important technology for refining and chemical enterprises to produce p-xylenemain process. Using naphtha as raw material, the p-xylene product is prepared through catalytic reforming, reformed oil separation, extraction, disproportionation, xylene separation and other steps, including reformed oil separation unit, extraction unit, disproportionation unit and xylene Separation units are collectively referred to as aromatics complexes.
芳烃联合装置。芳烃成套技术是目前炼化企业生产对二甲苯的主要工艺。以石脑油为原料，经催化重整、重整油分离、抽提、歧化、二甲苯分离等步骤制备获芳烃成套技术是目前炼化企业生产对二甲苯的主要工艺。以石脑油为原料，经催化重整、重整油分离、抽提、歧化、二甲苯分离等步骤制备获得对二甲苯产品，其中重整油分离装置、抽提装置、歧化装置和二甲苯分离装置统称为芳烃联合装置。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: A functional unit is defined as 1 ton of p-xylene product

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Two refineries in East China and one refinery in North China
华东两家炼厂企业和华北1家炼厂企业

technology.technologicalApplicability: The aromatics technology described is utilized for the production of p-xylene in refining and chemical industries. This process relies on naphtha as the primary raw material, and involves catalytic reforming, reformed oil separation, extraction, disproportionation, and p-xylene separation steps. P-xylene produced through this technology is a critical raw material for the manufacture of numerous products, including terephthalic acid (used in polyester production), plastic bottles, and fibers. The aromatics complex, which comprises the reformed oil separation unit, extraction unit, disproportionation unit, and xylene separation unit, is essential in producing high-purity p-xylene suitable for these applications.
所描述的芳烃成套技术用于炼油和化学工业中生产对二甲苯。该过程以石脑油为主要原料，涉及催化重整、重整油分离、抽提、歧化和对二甲苯分离步骤。通过此技术生产的对二甲苯是许多产品制造的关键原料，包括用于聚酯生产的对苯二甲酸（制造塑料瓶和纤维）。芳烃联合装置，包括重整油分离装置、抽提装置、歧化装置和二甲苯分离装置，在生产适用于这些应用的高纯度对二甲苯方面至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 陈广卫 & 张志智. 对二甲苯产品的碳足迹与减排措施. 化工环保 41, 774–778 (2021).
陈广卫 & 张志智. 对二甲苯产品的碳足迹与减排措施. 化工环保 41, 774–778 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this Life Cycle Assessment data for p-xylene production, ensure inclusion of emissions from all processing stages, specifically catalytic reforming, separation, extraction, disproportionation, and xylene separation. Consider data from both East China and North China refineries, as referenced in the 2019 Enterprise Production Report, for comprehensive life cycle analysis. The functional unit for analysis is defined as 1 ton of p-xylene product. Users should pay attention to regional variations in technology and emissions, and apply data carefully if generalizing to different geographic locations or production scales. Methodological advice also includes assessing potential for recycling and recovery within the process and accounting for technological applicability across different industry practices.
在使用对二甲苯生产的生命周期评估数据时，确保包括所有处理阶段的排放，特别是催化重整、分离、抽提、歧化和二甲苯分离。参考2019年企业生产报告中提及的华东和华北炼厂数据，进行全面的生命周期分析。分析的功能单位定义为1吨对二甲苯产品。用户应注意技术和排放的区域差异，并在将数据推广到不同地理位置或生产规模时谨慎应用。方法学建议还包括评估过程中循环利用和回收的潜力，并考虑技术在不同行业实践中的适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
